headline: The Bull Case For Avery Dennison (AVY) Could Change Following Strong Q3 Beat And Walmart RFID Push
summary: Avery Dennison recently reported fiscal Q3 2025 results that exceeded analyst expectations on adjusted EPS and revenue, and issued an upbeat adjusted EPS outlook for Q4 2025. Investor interest has also been supported by the roll-out of new RFID sensor labels for fresh food, developed in collaboration with Walmart, highlighting the company’s push deeper into digital identification solutions. We’ll now examine how the upbeat Q4 outlook and Walmart RFID collaboration could influence Avery...

headline: Avery Dennison to Webcast Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: MENTOR, Ohio, January 07, 2026--Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY), a leading global materials science and digital identification solutions company, today announced it will host its fourth quarter and full year 2025 earnings conference call at 11:00 a.m. ET on Wednesday, February 4, 2026. The company’s fourth quarter and full year 2025 earnings release will be issued that morning at approximately 6:45 a.m. ET.
